expression.expression-string: Vector3 foo = new Vector3(-(this.width / 2), -(this.height / 2), 0f); foo = foo.add(position);
Vector3 foo = new Vector3(-(this.width / 2), -(this.height / 2), 0f); foo = position;
Vector3 foo = new Vector3(-(this.width / 2), -(this.height / 2), 0f); // foo = foo.add(position);
Vector3 foo = new Vector3(-(this.width / 2), -(this.height / 2), 0f); foo = foo.add(position).rotate(entity.rot);
